item.title: Por: Ivo Gomes
item.dc:creator: Ivo Gomes
item.description: Hello James, thanks for your comment. I'm eager to see the slides for the second part of your workshop :)
item.content:encoded: Hello James, thanks for your comment. I’m eager to see the slides for the second part of your workshop :)

item.title: Por: James Page
item.dc:creator: James Page
item.description:
Hi,
As you missed the second workshop on <a href="http://webnographer.com"/ rel="nofollow"> Webnographer</a>, We will post our slidedeck from the 2nd workshops online, and if you have any questions just get back to us.
All the best
James
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

As you missed the second workshop on Webnographer, We will post our slidedeck from the 2nd workshops online, and if you have any questions just get back to us.

James
